name: Mending a Heart (Godot Wild Jam 30)
description:
Ah, you have a broken heart too? Well, you came to the right place.  Lets start mending!

This game has 3 levels, that may or may not have secrets 😏 The download could be slow, please be patient.

Controls:
  • WASD/arrow keys to move around.
  • Spacebar to call out.

This game was created within 48 hours for Godot Wild Jam #30. Fog shader with the help of Gonkee's tutorial.
